definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: The aromatic hydrocarbons content in naphtha was analyzed by a chemical reaction method.
sentences.chinese: 用化學分析方法測定了工業用石腦油中芳香烴的含量。

sentences.english: Saturation and aromatics affect the ductility of asphalt at low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 飽和烴和芳香烴影響瀝青的低溫延度和粘結性。

sentences.english: The simplest member of the aromatics series is benzene .
sentences.chinese: 芳香烴系列中最簡單的一個化合物是苯。

sentences.english: The green indicates the presence of complex molecules called polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons.
sentences.chinese: 綠色則表明了大分子多環芳香烴的存在。
